name: C4
description: An indica-leaning cross between Cotton Candy and Shiskaberry, C4 is known for its high yields and resin production that make it an excellent option for producing top-notch concentrates. The fruity aroma is highlighted by a thick, earthy tones that mixes with flavors of pine and citrus. Its deep, relaxing effects are recommended to those battling depression and anxiety, and are sure to blow you out of any funk you may find yourself in.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Uplifted, Happy, Euphoric, Sleepy, Depression, Stress, Pain, Insomnia, Nausea, Dry Eyes, Dry Mouth, Headache, Paranoid, Anxious
